title: Cross-Border E-Commerce Practical English Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and experience in e-commerce operations
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive classes based on actual cases encountered by current practitioners during work, providing a flexible learning environment using learners' personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can utilize ten key English expressions in international transactions with 90% accuracy.
Learners can apply and explain over five culturally contextualized expressions during English business communication in real-time video conferences.
Learners can analyze and apply English communication patterns specific to e-commerce platforms in practical settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
